Moving Version Labels

Moving a version label moves an existing label from one revision to another within the same versioned file. When moving version labels at the project, folder or project database level, all of the version labels that match the version label you are reassigning are moved.

To move a version label:

  1. Select the versioned file(s), project, folder, or project database that contains the version label you want to move.

  2. Select Actions | Version Label | Assign. The Assign Version Label dialog box appears.

  3. In the Assign Version Label field, enter the version label that you want to move.

  4. In the To revision field, enter the revision number, version label, or promotion group that identifies the revision you want the version label moved to or click the Browse button to select the revision.

  5. To instruct Version Manager to automatically move the version label with the latest (tip) revision each time a new revision is checked in, select the Float label with tip check box.

  6. From the If version label exists drop-down list, select Reassign.

  7. If you are moving a version label assigned to a project or project database, select the Include files in subprojects check box to move the version label in all of the versioned files contained in the project or project database.

  8. Click OK.
